post.body: cuz hes an old, sick man that doesnt trust anybody.
omg whatt? that is scary... and Im really sorry for you. sucks.
haha, its a damn good question! Start the present wrapping baby, before the annoying cooking starts. dad answered my xmasmail!
fuck batteries, I miss you here. a lot.
its what happens every time. ya cant stop thinking about the damn guy. so useless.
so what is your diet? I need help.
ever heard of recycle bin laden? I has it.
going to the vet for the first time in my life. Im still happy. but first: sociolinguibarf.
MY FATHER JUST SAID YES TO MY BAFÖG APPLICATION!!!!!!!!! Im so happpppy....
class was boooooooooooooooooooooooooooring. Im hungry and ready for the couch. season finale of dexter tonight. pigs need the vet too...
fell asleep. shibbys call just woke me up. darnit thank god. I need to study. oh, my six word short stories are very cryptic my prof says.
I waited AN HOUR for the bafög beratung with nothing to do. that drove me insane! but I got what I needed. so lets convince dad. plaeeeeese.
when I take pictures of my sister I always take some extra ones to have more later in case she dies.
I finished writing one of the essays. got 690 words instead of 450. grrreat.
amazing how much time it takes me to write a simple essay on skills.
Ha, I found a genius thesis statement. and Im downloading wieners. weird silence on icq tho.
I DONT WANNA DO THIIIS... ANYMOOORE...
just woke up. watchin drake and josh. 2 essays are waiting to be written. ugh.
Peter Sarsgaard fully naked kissing a man - hotness. Thank God we live in a sexually aufgeklärt age.
watchin Oh Brother with George Clooney. Spilled water on the table. Ate my chocolate. Swam for an hour straight. Want spaghetti.
decorating the tree is still annoying. even though the anti-christmas me bought herself golden glittery things. my sis sings to miley cyrus.
I slept the whole time. craazy dreams. mom bought a christmas tree already. going swimming later. being in pajamas is cool. want chocolate!!
I spent whole day alone on twitter. that is boring and also makes me feel like I have no life :) So good night my friends.
I finally managed to change the browser color!! (to pink of course). Sadly the colorful tabs add-on doesnt seem to work.
cleaned the pigs home, am now accomplished for the day. I wonder if its a test, so Im not gonna ask for my presents today. g'old night.
food burnt, disgusting anyway. mission happy family failed for the most part. mom says we should watch tv. hmm.
my sister is constantly shitting her pants and delaying the annoying dinner. trying to keep mom happy. I want my present...
omg, I had to entertain santa clause for 10 min in spanish!! Now I have a reason to be embarrassed! He is cuuuute.
santa clause from chile is here and he is cute and I feel a little embarrassed.
gonna drive the family tour bus to the notapotheke. thank god time goes by faster. why do they have to show titanic today??
my sister just drank seifenblasenflüssigkeit. (she also eats knete) Not that boring after all.
hilarious: http://is.gd/dibt
I might run around the block out of pure boredom. who has time on this day? I need shops to survive. Oh I might twitter alot in the next 48h
http://tinyurl.com/836kqy thats all I need to say.
so...am I gonna say happy christmas? ok, happy christmas! I just dont give about this holiday. but presents are always nice! Just kidding.
slept in, when I didnt want to. I hate that stores are closed for 2 days now. The christmas day starts and its looong and boring. as usual.
I think Jesse Spencer is hot. And Loriot is awesome. And it sucks no one is online. No, I have nothing better to do.
too dumb to write, man. maischi has a religious debate with hilarious catholics going on. gonna watch the house re-run.
I took 6 fucking aspiring and nothing gives! Im also bored as hell. if it wasnt midnight Id go visit somebody. watchin rtl2 asi reportag ...
headache braindead.
